edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll

Class CourseRoll

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll.CourseRoll

  • public class CourseRoll
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of a roll of students. Students can enroll or drop.
    Author:
    Conner McCarthy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a CourseRoll object with an enrollment cap

        public void setEnrollmentCap(int cap)
        Sets the enrollment cap if "cap" is between 10 and 250 and enrollment cap is less that the roll size
        Parameters:
        cap - enrollment cap
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the cap is less than 10 or more than 250
